page.title: 02BRANT BROUGHTON'S NEW SCHOOL
page.content: A new four classroom CE/Methodist Primary School was completed in August 1984. This replaced two former schools -a Methodist Infant School which is now used by the village playgroup and a CE Junior School which is currently up for sale.The new school was in use from the Autumn Term 1984 and was officially opened on December 7th. 1984 by the principal of Bishop Grosseteste College, Lincoln. Two PTA events were organised during the Summer Term 1985 - a Children's Fancy Dress Barbecue and a Games Evening where adults and children took part in ten games and amassed as many points as possible. Some junior children spent a week near Ironbridge and the infants spent a day at Caythorpe Agricultural College.The school came second in the local area sports at Claypole.
